name: fixelart
description: Tool to fix AI-generated pixelart - or just turn your image into pixelart
author: Szymon Wiszczuk <golota60@gmail.com>

scripts.release:patch: yarn build && standard-version --release-as patch && yarn publish
scripts.release:minor: yarn build && standard-version --release-as minor && yarn publish
scripts.release:major: yarn build && standard-version --release-as major && yarn publish
